text: I'm very accepting with my age. It's like notches on your belt: experience, wisdom, and a different kind of beauty. There comes a day when you've become comfortable in your skin.
author: Zoe Saldana

text: My wife has brought great beauty into my life. And my daughter has brought me nothing but joy. Those qualities were greatly lacking.
author: Christopher Meloni

text: My mother never put an emphasis on looks. She let us grow up on our own time line. She never forced any beauty regimen into my world.
author: Rachel McAdams

text: It is very necessary to have markers of beauty left in a world seemingly bent on making the most evil ugliness.
author: Thornton Wilder

text: Hollywood needs to recognise all shades of African American beauty.
author: Gabrielle Union
